title: The Good, the Bad, and the Bunny
description: Do the Right Thing. You can always regret it later.It's Happy Bunny shows you the difference between right and wrong, good and bad, evil and eviler.What do you do when someone you know smells stinky?What about when you hold open a door for a stranger and they don't say thank you?Or when a friend loses your favorite DVD?Now you can be the person you always wanted to pretend to be!Remember, It's Happy Bunny will be nicer when everyone else is smarter.
author: Jim Benton
